question.text:
Match the following and select the correct answer:
 
  Column I   Column II
(a) Centriole (p) Infoldings in mitochondria
(b) Chlorophyll (q) Thylakoids
(c) Cristae (r) Nucleic acids
(d) Ribozymes (s) Basal body cilia or flagella

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></math>

solution.text:
(a) Centrioles (s) Basal body of cilia and flagella
(b) Chlorophyll (q) Thylakoids
(c) Cristae (p) Infoldings of mitochondrial membrane
(d) Ribozyme (r) Nucleic acids
